Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The price of $7,000,000 is below replacement costs for this type of facility. The zoning allows for multiple uses and the site offers additional expansion and development potential. See CIM for more details.

CBRE Limited has been retained on an exclusive basis to coordinate the sale of 24 Stavanger Drive, a ±127,500 SF single storey commercial building centrally located in St. John’s, NL.87,500 SF vacant, with a call centre operating in 40,000 SF, the facility has over 650 surface parking stalls, loading facilities and a partial basement. 24 Stavanger Drive is a high-profile site withsignificant visibility in the Stavanger Shopping Area. Zoned C2 Limited Commercial, the property can accommodate a wide range of retail, office, and general commercial uses.

The Stavanger unenclosed commercial center remains the strongest multi-use site in the Province. With the announcement 2019 that Exxon Mobil will be relocating to Hebron Way, we expect that a number of oil and gas occupiers will follow suit. This trend will further solidify the Stavanger Drive area and its importance to the Newfoundland & Labrador real estate market. The subject site features approximately 1 acre of improved and serviced land with a 14,732 square foot building. This asset represents a prime redevelopment opportunity in the east end market, with numerous scenarios that would yield above average returns for an owner occupier, or investor.
